Hi,

We are getting an exception whilst running the JUnit test cases generated 
for the EJB. This is the stack trace of the exception:

java.rmi.MarshalException: CORBA MARSHAL 0x0 No; nested exception is: 
        org.omg.CORBA.MARSHAL:   minor code: 0  completed: No
org.omg.CORBA.MARSHAL:   minor code: 0  completed: No

Any idea how to resolve this issue. I think this problem is related to 
some jar but, not sure.

Thanks in advance.
Sachin Dholakia
